attributes.action: Make sure that veterans have somewhere to live after being in the forces
attributes.additional_details:
risking not only their lives and families also friends and their homes they also suffer from  Depression
, Stress, no self confidence feeling like they didn't do enough to save our country from the most traumatic experiences ever
attributes.background: Most veterans are not treated how they should be risking everything family, their lives etc most veterans come out of the services suffering PTSD, Anxiety etc feeling like they done nothing to save our country. Most veterans come back from being deployed for a long time being left with nothing
